name: Evilron (Houdini Game Jam 2020)
description:
EVILRON

No matter where you go,
Evilron will find you.
The only way to make him stop
is stand still as a rock...

But can you? Don't panic!

Controls:

Left / Right Arrow to Move. Shift to Walk. Hold Esc to Exit. 

Credits:
All environment art was made with Houdini.
Game and code by Chrisis. Music Chrisis & an AI.

Character, animations and vfx are from the AssetStore. 
Sound fx by Soniss GDC.

HDAs are in the game zip :) Have fun and thank you for playing!
